name: Kendle Crown
description:
Kendle Crown is a short, fast-paced 2.5D action RPG game made by a two person team as a student project. Any feedback and support is welcome!

Story

The Kendle Kingdom was home to the Celestial Crown, which was responsible for keeping the world's magic harmonic. Until, one day, the crown was broken and all but one of its pieces were stolen. Amélie, a royal squire, and her companions went on a journey in order to restore the crown to its full potential and make the world harmonious once again.

Controls

  • Left/Right to Move
  • Spacebar to Advance Dialogue
  • W/A/S/D to Perform Actions
  • Up/Down to Change Target

Available Languages

  • English
  • Portuguese
